io.itch.jaknak72.oozed.game.objects

Class Copter

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.itch.jaknak72.oozed.game.objects.GameObject
      • io.itch.jaknak72.oozed.game.objects.Enemy
        • io.itch.jaknak72.oozed.game.objects.Copter

  • public class Copter
extends Enemy
    Enemy with a small helicopter, can hover on start position or fly upwards (also takes rotation into account) the rotor on top is deadly for the player
    Author:
    simon
